content.raw:
Nice! This loads for me with Gazebo 8. Some details I noticed:

* Pose updates are very choppy, the double pendulum gets disassembled.
* Gazebo materials are not working, the simple shapes should be gray, the cabinet should have a wooden texture...
* Some other materials don't work either. The houses, the simple arm...
* Are lights working?
* Collisions are showing up white
content.html:
Nice! This loads for me with Gazebo 8. Some details I noticed:

  • Pose updates are very choppy, the double pendulum gets disassembled.
  • Gazebo materials are not working, the simple shapes should be gray, the cabinet should have a wooden texture...
  • Some other materials don't work either. The houses, the simple arm...
  • Are lights working?
  • Collisions are showing up white
